Jokowi Heran Impor Elpiji Cs Jalan Terus Meski Neraca Dagang Tekor
06 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Hendra Kusuma


Ilustrasi Foto: Antara Foto

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) kembali menyinggung tekornya neraca perdagangan. Kepala negara heran, Indonesia yang memiliki banyak sumber daya alam namun masih impor beberapa komoditas dalam jumlah besar."Misalnya impor petrokimia gede sekali, padahal kita bisa produksi barang-barang itu. Kenapa harus diteruskan? Impor elpiji, kenapa harus impor elpiji? Batu bara dengan teknologi bisa dikonversi ke elpiji, kita gudangnya batubara dengan sangat melimpah," kata Jokowi saat membuka Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 di Hotel Fairmont, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Indonesia juga masih tercatat mengimpor avtur alias bahan bakar pesawat yang sebetulnya bisa diproduksi dari minyak kelapa sawit (CPO). Persoalan ini, kata Jokowi, menjadi penyebab utama neraca perdagangan tekor alias defisit."Kenapa kita terus-terusan ekspor dalam bentuk raw material. Ini yang sebabkan CAD dan neraca dagang defisit," ujarnya.Menurut Jokowi, dalam lima tahun ke depan tujuan Pemerintah adalah menciptakan lapangan kerja. Sehingga melalui produk substitusi impor bisa menyelesaikan angka pengangguran terbuka yang berjumlah sekitar 7 juta jiwa. Pasalnya, substitusi impor berarti diproduksi dalam negeri dan melibatkan banyak tenaga kerja."Goal besar kita, bangun produksi cipta lapangan kerja. Masih ada kurang lebih 7 juta pengangguran yang harus diberikan ruang agar mereka bisa bekerja semuanya," ungkapnya.Simak Video "Elpiji Melon Rencananya Tak Dijual Bebas, Apa Alasannya?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/ang)

Jokowi Surprisingly, LPG Imports Cs Goes On Even though the Trade Balance is in Standing
Nov 6 2019, 06:03 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo Illustration: Between Photos

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) again alluded to the overturn of the trade balance. The head of state is surprised, Indonesia has a lot of natural resources but still imports a number of commodities in large quantities. "For example, petrochemical imports are very large, even though we can produce these goods. Why should it be continued? LPG imports, why should LPG imports? Coal with technology that can be converted to LPG, we store coal with abundant coal, "Jokowi said when opening the Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 at the Fairmont Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Indonesia is also still recorded as importing aviation fuel, which is actually aircraft fuel. can be produced from palm oil (CPO). This issue, said Jokowi, is the main cause of the deficit trade balance, aka deficit. "Why do we continue to export in the form of raw material. This is what causes the CAD and trade balance to be in deficit," he said. creating jobs. So that through import substitution products can solve the open unemployment rate of around 7 million people. Because import substitution means that it is produced domestically and involves a lot of labor. "Our big goal is to build employment production. There are still approximately 7 million unemployed people who need to be given space so that they can work all of them," he said.
